author: Nicholas Jamieson <nicholas@cartant.com>
description: An in-memory, JavaScript mock for the Firebase Web API
name: firebase-nightlight

scripts.dist: npm run dist:client && npm run dist:admin
scripts.dist:admin:build: npm run pre:admin && npm run dist:admin:clean && npm run dist:admin:copy && tsc -p tsconfig-dist-admin.json
scripts.dist:client: npm run dist:client:build && npm run dist:client:uglify && node scripts/banner.js
scripts.dist:client:build: npm run pre:client && npm run dist:client:clean && npm run dist:client:copy && tsc -p tsconfig-dist-client.json && browserify dist/index.js -s firebaseNightlight -o bundles/firebase-nightlight.umd.js
scripts.dist:client:clean: rimraf dist && rimraf bundles/firebase-nightlight.* && mkdirp bundles
scripts.pre:admin: npm run pre:clean && node scripts/preprocess.js --admin && npm run pre:admin:lint
scripts.pre:client: npm run pre:clean && node scripts/preprocess.js && npm run pre:client:lint
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && npm run dist
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:admin
scripts.test:admin: npm run test:admin:build && mocha build/admin/**/*-spec.js --reporter spec
scripts.test:admin:build: npm run pre:admin && npm run test:admin:clean && npm run test:admin:copy && tsc -p tsconfig-admin.json
scripts.test:client:build: npm run pre:client && npm run test:client:clean && npm run test:client:copy && tsc -p tsconfig-client.json && browserify build/index-spec.js -s firebaseNightlightTest -o bundles/firebase-nightlight-test.umd.js
scripts.test:client:clean: rimraf build && rimraf bundles/firebase-nightlight-test.* && mkdirp bundles
